sqlMap.select: /* eventUser.getSysdate */ SELECT TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yyyymmdd')FROM DUAL

/* eventUser.mainGetEvent */ SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT A.*,ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT ST1.EVENT_SEQ ,ST1.DOMAIN_ID ,ST1.CATEGORY_SEQ ,ST1.TITLE ,ST1.CONTENTS ,ST1.IMAGE_PATH_SUB ,ST1.PLACE_BUILDING ,ST1.IMAGE_PATH ,ST1.IMAGE_NM ,ST1.CATEGORY_NM ,ST1.START_DATE ,ST1.END_DATE ,ST1.START_TIME ,ST1.END_TIME ,ST1.EVENT_START_DATE ,ST1.EVENT_END_DATE ,ST1.EVENT_START_TIME ,ST1.EVENT_END_TIME ,ST1.TARGET_LINK ,ST1.REG_DATIM FROM ( SELECT T1.EVENT_SEQ ,T1.DOMAIN_ID ,T1.CATEGORY_SEQ
,T1.TITLE_KOR AS TITLE ,T1.CONTENTS_KOR AS CONTENTS ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_ENG AS IMAGE_PATH_SUB ,T1.PLACE_BUILDING_KOR || T1.PLACE_NM AS PLACE_BUILDING ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_KOR AS IMAGE_PATH ,T1.IMAGE_NM_KOR AS IMAGE_NM ,T3.NM_KOR AS CATEGORY_NM
,T1.TITLE_ENG AS TITLE ,T1.CONTENTS_ENG AS CONTENTS ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_KOR AS IMAGE_PATH_SUB ,T1.PLACE_BUILDING_ENG || T1.PLACE_NM AS PLACE_BUILDING ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_ENG AS IMAGE_PATH ,T1.IMAGE_NM_ENG AS IMAGE_NM ,T3.NM_ENG AS CATEGORY_NM
,TO_CHAR(T1.START_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(T1.END_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS END_DATE ,SUBSTR(T1.START_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.START_TIME,3,4) AS START_TIME ,SUBSTR(T1.END_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.END_TIME,3,4) AS END_TIME ,TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_START,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS EVENT_START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_END,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS EVENT_END_DATE ,SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_START_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_START_TIME,3,4) AS EVENT_START_TIME ,SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_END_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_END_TIME,3,4) AS EVENT_END_TIME ,T1.TARGET_LINK ,T1.REG_DATIM FROM EVENT T1 ,EVENT_TARGET T2 ,EVENT_CATEGORY T3 WHERE T1.EVENT_SEQ = T2.EVENT_SEQ AND T1.CATEGORY_SEQ = T3.CATEGORY_SEQ AND T2.DEPT_CODE = #GROUP_ID# AND T1.STATE ='1' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') /*주요이벤트여부*/ AND T1.PRIORTY = 'Y'
ORDER BY START_DATE ASC )ST1 ) A ) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ((#PAGE_NUM#-1)*#PAGE_SIZE#+1) AND #PAGE_NUM#*#PAGE_SIZE#

/* eventUser.getEvent */ SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT A.*,ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT ST1.EVENT_SEQ ,ST1.DOMAIN_ID ,ST1.CATEGORY_SEQ ,ST1.TITLE ,ST1.CONTENTS ,ST1.IMAGE_PATH_SUB ,ST1.PLACE_BUILDING ,ST1.IMAGE_PATH ,ST1.IMAGE_NM ,ST1.CATEGORY_NM ,ST1.START_DATE ,ST1.END_DATE ,ST1.START_TIME ,ST1.END_TIME ,ST1.EVENT_START_DATE ,ST1.EVENT_END_DATE ,ST1.EVENT_START_TIME ,ST1.EVENT_END_TIME ,ST1.TARGET_LINK ,ST1.REG_DATIM FROM ( SELECT T1.EVENT_SEQ ,T1.DOMAIN_ID ,T1.CATEGORY_SEQ
,T1.TITLE_KOR AS TITLE ,T1.CONTENTS_KOR AS CONTENTS ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_ENG AS IMAGE_PATH_SUB ,T1.PLACE_BUILDING_KOR || T1.PLACE_NM AS PLACE_BUILDING ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_KOR AS IMAGE_PATH ,T1.IMAGE_NM_KOR AS IMAGE_NM ,T3.NM_KOR AS CATEGORY_NM
,T1.TITLE_ENG AS TITLE ,T1.CONTENTS_ENG AS CONTENTS ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_KOR AS IMAGE_PATH_SUB ,T1.PLACE_BUILDING_ENG || T1.PLACE_NM AS PLACE_BUILDING ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_ENG AS IMAGE_PATH ,T1.IMAGE_NM_ENG AS IMAGE_NM ,T3.NM_ENG AS CATEGORY_NM
,TO_CHAR(T1.START_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(T1.END_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS END_DATE ,SUBSTR(T1.START_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.START_TIME,3,4) AS START_TIME ,SUBSTR(T1.END_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.END_TIME,3,4) AS END_TIME ,TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_START,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS EVENT_START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_END,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS EVENT_END_DATE ,SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_START_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_START_TIME,3,4) AS EVENT_START_TIME ,SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_END_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_END_TIME,3,4) AS EVENT_END_TIME ,T1.TARGET_LINK ,T1.REG_DATIM FROM EVENT T1 ,EVENT_TARGET T2 ,EVENT_CATEGORY T3 WHERE T1.EVENT_SEQ = T2.EVENT_SEQ AND T1.CATEGORY_SEQ = T3.CATEGORY_SEQ AND T2.DEPT_CODE = #GROUP_ID# AND T1.STATE ='1' AND T1.DOMAIN_ID = #DOMAIN_ID# AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') /*오늘시작한 이벤트*/ /*주요이벤트여부*/ AND T1.PRIORTY = 'Y'
ORDER BY START_DATE ASC )ST1 UNION ALL SELECT ST2.EVENT_SEQ ,ST2.DOMAIN_ID ,ST2.CATEGORY_SEQ ,ST2.TITLE ,ST2.CONTENTS ,ST2.IMAGE_PATH_SUB ,ST2.PLACE_BUILDING ,ST2.IMAGE_PATH ,ST2.IMAGE_NM ,ST2.CATEGORY_NM ,ST2.START_DATE ,ST2.END_DATE ,ST2.START_TIME ,ST2.END_TIME ,ST2.EVENT_START_DATE ,ST2.EVENT_END_DATE ,ST2.EVENT_START_TIME ,ST2.EVENT_END_TIME ,ST2.TARGET_LINK ,ST2.REG_DATIM FROM ( SELECT T1.EVENT_SEQ ,T1.DOMAIN_ID ,T1.CATEGORY_SEQ
,T1.TITLE_KOR AS TITLE ,T1.CONTENTS_KOR AS CONTENTS ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_ENG AS IMAGE_PATH_SUB ,T1.PLACE_BUILDING_KOR || T1.PLACE_NM AS PLACE_BUILDING ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_KOR AS IMAGE_PATH ,T1.IMAGE_NM_KOR AS IMAGE_NM ,T3.NM_KOR AS CATEGORY_NM
,T1.TITLE_ENG AS TITLE ,T1.CONTENTS_ENG AS CONTENTS ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_KOR AS IMAGE_PATH_SUB ,T1.PLACE_BUILDING_ENG || T1.PLACE_NM AS PLACE_BUILDING ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_ENG AS IMAGE_PATH ,T1.IMAGE_NM_ENG AS IMAGE_NM ,T3.NM_ENG AS CATEGORY_NM
,TO_CHAR(T1.START_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(T1.END_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS END_DATE ,SUBSTR(T1.START_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.START_TIME,3,4) AS START_TIME ,SUBSTR(T1.END_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.END_TIME,3,4) AS END_TIME ,TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_START,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS EVENT_START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_END,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS EVENT_END_DATE ,SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_START_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_START_TIME,3,4) AS EVENT_START_TIME ,SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_END_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_END_TIME,3,4) AS EVENT_END_TIME ,T1.TARGET_LINK ,T1.REG_DATIM FROM EVENT T1 ,EVENT_TARGET T2 ,EVENT_CATEGORY T3 WHERE T1.EVENT_SEQ = T2.EVENT_SEQ AND T1.CATEGORY_SEQ = T3.CATEGORY_SEQ AND T2.DEPT_CODE = #GROUP_ID# AND T1.STATE ='1' AND T1.DOMAIN_ID = #DOMAIN_ID# AND (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') > TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) /*이미시작한 이벤트*/ /*주요이벤트여부*/ AND T1.PRIORTY = 'Y'
ORDER BY END_DATE ASC, START_DATE ASC )ST2 UNION ALL SELECT ST3.EVENT_SEQ ,ST3.DOMAIN_ID ,ST3.CATEGORY_SEQ ,ST3.TITLE ,ST3.CONTENTS ,ST3.IMAGE_PATH_SUB ,ST3.PLACE_BUILDING ,ST3.IMAGE_PATH ,ST3.IMAGE_NM ,ST3.CATEGORY_NM ,ST3.START_DATE ,ST3.END_DATE ,ST3.START_TIME ,ST3.END_TIME ,ST3.EVENT_START_DATE ,ST3.EVENT_END_DATE ,ST3.EVENT_START_TIME ,ST3.EVENT_END_TIME ,ST3.TARGET_LINK ,ST3.REG_DATIM FROM ( SELECT T1.EVENT_SEQ ,T1.DOMAIN_ID ,T1.CATEGORY_SEQ
,T1.TITLE_KOR AS TITLE ,T1.CONTENTS_KOR AS CONTENTS ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_ENG AS IMAGE_PATH_SUB ,T1.PLACE_BUILDING_KOR || T1.PLACE_NM AS PLACE_BUILDING ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_KOR AS IMAGE_PATH ,T1.IMAGE_NM_KOR AS IMAGE_NM ,T3.NM_KOR AS CATEGORY_NM
,T1.TITLE_ENG AS TITLE ,T1.CONTENTS_ENG AS CONTENTS ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_KOR AS IMAGE_PATH_SUB ,T1.PLACE_BUILDING_ENG || T1.PLACE_NM AS PLACE_BUILDING ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_ENG AS IMAGE_PATH ,T1.IMAGE_NM_ENG AS IMAGE_NM ,T3.NM_ENG AS CATEGORY_NM
,TO_CHAR(T1.START_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(T1.END_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS END_DATE ,SUBSTR(T1.START_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.START_TIME,3,4) AS START_TIME ,SUBSTR(T1.END_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.END_TIME,3,4) AS END_TIME ,TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_START,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS EVENT_START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_END,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS EVENT_END_DATE ,SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_START_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_START_TIME,3,4) AS EVENT_START_TIME ,SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_END_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_END_TIME,3,4) AS EVENT_END_TIME ,T1.TARGET_LINK ,T1.REG_DATIM FROM EVENT T1 ,EVENT_TARGET T2 ,EVENT_CATEGORY T3 WHERE T1.EVENT_SEQ = T2.EVENT_SEQ AND T1.CATEGORY_SEQ = T3.CATEGORY_SEQ AND T2.DEPT_CODE = #GROUP_ID# AND T1.STATE ='1' AND T1.DOMAIN_ID = #DOMAIN_ID# AND ((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') < TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND (TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+30, 'YYYYMMDD'))) /*시작 할 이벤트*/ /*주요이벤트여부*/ AND T1.PRIORTY = 'Y'
ORDER BY START_DATE ASC )ST3 ) A ) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ((#PAGE_NUM#-1)*#PAGE_SIZE#+1) AND #PAGE_NUM#*#PAGE_SIZE#

/* eventUser.eventGroup */ SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT A.*,ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT ST1.EVENT_SEQ ,ST1.TARGET_LINK ,ST1.CATEGORY_NM ,ST1.CATEGORY_SEQ ,ST1.TITLE ,ST1.CONTENTS ,ST1.IMAGE_PATH ,ST1.START_DATE ,ST1.START_TIME FROM ( SELECT
T1.EVENT_SEQ AS EVENT_SEQ ,T1.CATEGORY_SEQ AS CATEGORY_SEQ ,T1.TARGET_LINK AS TARGET_LINK
,T1.TITLE_KOR AS TITLE ,T1.CONTENTS_KOR AS CONTENTS ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_KOR AS IMAGE_PATH ,T3.NM_KOR AS CATEGORY_NM
,T1.TITLE_ENG AS TITLE ,T1.CONTENTS_ENG AS CONTENTS ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_ENG AS IMAGE_PATH ,T3.NM_ENG AS CATEGORY_NM
,T1.START_DATE AS START_DATE ,T1.START_TIME AS START_TIME
FROM EVENT T1 ,EVENT_TARGET T2 ,EVENT_CATEGORY T3 WHERE T1.EVENT_SEQ = T2.EVENT_SEQ AND T1.CATEGORY_SEQ = T3.CATEGORY_SEQ
AND T2.DEPT_CODE = #groupId#
AND T1.STATE ='1' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY START_DATE ASC )ST1 UNION ALL SELECT ST2.EVENT_SEQ ,ST2.TARGET_LINK ,ST2.CATEGORY_NM ,ST2.CATEGORY_SEQ ,ST2.TITLE ,ST2.CONTENTS ,ST2.IMAGE_PATH ,ST2.START_DATE ,ST2.START_TIME FROM ( SELECT
T1.EVENT_SEQ AS EVENT_SEQ ,T1.CATEGORY_SEQ AS CATEGORY_SEQ ,T1.TARGET_LINK AS TARGET_LINK
,T1.TITLE_KOR AS TITLE ,T1.CONTENTS_KOR AS CONTENTS ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_KOR AS IMAGE_PATH ,T3.NM_KOR AS CATEGORY_NM
,T1.TITLE_ENG AS TITLE ,T1.CONTENTS_ENG AS CONTENTS ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_ENG AS IMAGE_PATH ,T3.NM_ENG AS CATEGORY_NM
,T1.START_DATE AS START_DATE ,T1.START_TIME AS START_TIME
FROM EVENT T1 ,EVENT_TARGET T2 ,EVENT_CATEGORY T3 WHERE T1.EVENT_SEQ = T2.EVENT_SEQ AND T1.CATEGORY_SEQ = T3.CATEGORY_SEQ
AND T2.DEPT_CODE = #groupId#
AND T1.STATE ='1' AND ((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') < TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND (TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+30, 'YYYYMMDD'))) ORDER BY START_DATE ASC )ST2 UNION ALL SELECT ST3.EVENT_SEQ ,ST3.TARGET_LINK ,ST3.CATEGORY_NM ,ST3.CATEGORY_SEQ ,ST3.TITLE ,ST3.CONTENTS ,ST3.IMAGE_PATH ,ST3.START_DATE ,ST3.START_TIME FROM ( SELECT
T1.EVENT_SEQ AS EVENT_SEQ ,T1.CATEGORY_SEQ AS CATEGORY_SEQ ,T1.TARGET_LINK AS TARGET_LINK
,T1.TITLE_KOR AS TITLE ,T1.CONTENTS_KOR AS CONTENTS ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_KOR AS IMAGE_PATH ,T3.NM_KOR AS CATEGORY_NM
,T1.TITLE_ENG AS TITLE ,T1.CONTENTS_ENG AS CONTENTS ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_ENG AS IMAGE_PATH ,T3.NM_ENG AS CATEGORY_NM
,T1.START_DATE AS START_DATE ,T1.START_TIME AS START_TIME
FROM EVENT T1 ,EVENT_TARGET T2 ,EVENT_CATEGORY T3 WHERE T1.EVENT_SEQ = T2.EVENT_SEQ AND T1.CATEGORY_SEQ = T3.CATEGORY_SEQ
AND T2.DEPT_CODE = #groupId#
AND T1.STATE ='1' AND (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') > TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) ORDER BY END_DATE ASC, START_DATE ASC )ST3 ) A ) B WHERE RNUM <=3

/* eventUser.getCateEvent */ SELECT ST3.CATEGORY_SEQ AS CATEGORY_SEQ ,'(' || COALESCE(ST2.CNT,0) || ')' AS CNT
,ST3.NM_KOR AS CATEGORY_NM
,ST3.NM_ENG AS CATEGORY_NM
FROM ( SELECT ST1.CATEGORY_SEQ ,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT T1.EVENT_SEQ ,T1.CATEGORY_SEQ FROM EVENT T1, EVENT_TARGET T2 WHERE T1.EVENT_SEQ = T2.EVENT_SEQ AND T2.DEPT_CODE = #GROUP_ID# AND T1.STATE ='1' AND T1.DOMAIN_ID =CAST(#DOMAIN_ID# AS INTEGER) )ST1 WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY ST1.CATEGORY_SEQ )ST2 RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CATEGORY_SEQ ,UP_CATEGORY_SEQ ,STATE ,NM_KOR ,NM_ENG ,REMARK ,UPD_DATIM ,UPD_USER_ID ,REL_CATEGORY_NO ,DSP_ORDER ,DEPT_CODE ,REG_DATIM ,REG_USER_ID FROM EVENT_CATEGORY T1 WHERE T1.STATE = 'Y' AND T1.DOMAIN_ID =CAST(#DOMAIN_ID# AS INTEGER) )ST3 ON ST2.CATEGORY_SEQ = ST3.CATEGORY_SEQ

/* eventUser.getDeptEvent */ SELECT ST1.DEPT_CODE AS DEPT_CODE ,'(' || COUNT(*) || ')' AS CNT FROM ( SELECT T1.EVENT_SEQ
,T1.DEPT_CODE_KOR AS DEPT_CODE
,T1.DEPT_CODE_ENG AS DEPT_CODE
FROM EVENT T1, EVENT_TARGET T2 WHERE T1.EVENT_SEQ = T2.EVENT_SEQ AND T2.DEPT_CODE = #GROUP_ID# AND T1.STATE ='1' AND DOMAIN_ID = CAST(#DOMAIN_ID# AS INTEGER) )ST1 WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY ST1.DEPT_CODE
/* eventUser.checkAppay */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EVENT_PEOPLE WHERE EVENT_SEQ = CAST(#EVENT_SEQ# AS INTEGER) AND USER_ID = #USER_ID#
sqlMap.insert:
/* eventUser.insertPeople */ INSERT INTO EVENT_PEOPLE ( EVENT_SEQ ,PEOPLE_SEQ ,USER_ID ,DEPT_CODE ,NAME ,APPLY_DATE ,REG_DATIM ,REG_USER_ID ,STATE )VALUES( #EVENT_SEQ# ,COALESCE((SELECT MAX(T1.PEOPLE_SEQ + 1) AS NEXT_SEQ FROM EVENT_PEOPLE T1 WHERE T1.EVENT_SEQ = #EVENT_SEQ#),1) ,#USER_ID#
,#DEPT_KOR#
,#DEPT_ENG#
,#NAME# ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE ,#USER_ID# ,'Y' )
sqlMap.delete: /* eventUser.deletePeople */ DELETE FROM EVENT_PEOPLE WHERE EVENT_SEQ = CAST(#EVENT_SEQ# AS INTEGER) AND USER_ID = #USER_ID#
sqlMap.select: /* eventUser.scheduleEvent */ SELECT T1.EVENT_SEQ ,T1.TITLE_KOR ,TRIM(T1.TARGET_LINK) AS TARGET_LINK ,TO_CHAR(T1.START_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(T1.END_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS END_DATE ,T1.START_TIME ,T1.END_TIME ,T1.EVENT_FEE_KOR ,T1.OWNER_USER_ID ,T1.OWNER_PHONE ,T1.OWNER_EMAIL ,COALESCE(T1.PLACE_BUILDING_KOR,'') || COALESCE(T1.PLACE_NO,'') || COALESCE(T1.PLACE_SUB_NO,'') || COALESCE(T1.PLACE_NM,'') AS PLACE ,T1.REG_DATIM ,T1.REG_USER_ID ,T1.REG_USER_NM FROM EVENT T1 WHERE T1.EVENT_SEQ = CAST(#EVENT_SEQ# AS INTEGER)
sqlMap.update: /* eventUser.deleteEvent */ UPDATE EVENT SET STATE = '2' ,UPD_USER_ID = #USER_ID# ,UPD_DATIM = SYSDATE WHERE EVENT_SEQ = #EVENT_SEQ#
sqlMap.select:
/* eventUser.getExplEvent */ SELECT T1.EVENT_SEQ ,T1.DOMAIN_ID ,T1.CATEGORY_SEQ ,T1.EVENT_TYPE ,T1.PRIORTY ,T1.TITLE_KOR ,T1.TITLE_ENG ,T1.CONTENTS_KOR ,T1.CONTENTS_ENG ,TRIM(T1.TARGET_LINK) AS TARGET_LINK ,TO_CHAR(T1.START_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(T1.START_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS START_DATE1 ,TO_CHAR(T1.END_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS END_DATE ,TO_CHAR(T1.END_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS END_DATE1 ,SUBSTR(T1.START_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.START_TIME,3,4) AS START_TIME ,SUBSTR(T1.END_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.END_TIME,3,4) AS END_TIME ,T1.INQ_TIMES ,T1.STATE
,(CASE WHEN T1.STATE = '0' THEN '신청' WHEN T1.STATE = '1' THEN '승인' END) AS STATE_NM ,T2.NM_KOR AS CATEGORY_NM
,(CASE WHEN T1.STATE = '0' THEN 'Request' WHEN T1.STATE = '1' THEN 'Approval' END) AS STATE_NM ,T2.NM_ENG AS CATEGORY_NM
,T1.EVENT_FEE_KOR ,T1.EVENT_FEE_ENG ,T1.OWNER_USER_ID ,T1.OWNER_PHONE ,T1.OWNER_EMAIL ,T1.PLACE_NO ,T1.PLACE_SUB_NO ,T1.PLACE_NM ,T1.PLACE_BUILDING_KOR ,T1.PLACE_BUILDING_ENG ,T1.PLACE_LATITUDE ,T1.PLACE_LONGITUDE ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_KOR ,T1.IMAGE_NM_KOR ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_ENG ,T1.IMAGE_NM_ENG ,T1.DEPT_CODE_KOR ,T1.DEPT_CODE_ENG ,T1.ATTACH_NO ,T1.GROUP_ID ,T1.REG_DATIM ,T1.REG_USER_ID ,T1.REG_USER_NM ,T1.UPD_DATIM ,T1.UPD_USER_ID ,TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_START,'YYYYMMDD') AS EVENT_START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_START,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS EVENT_START_DATE1 ,TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_END,'YYYYMMDD') AS EVENT_END_DATE ,TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_END,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS EVENT_END_DATE1 ,SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_START_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_START_TIME,3,4) AS EVENT_START_TIME ,SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_END_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.EVENT_END_TIME,3,4) AS EVENT_END_TIME
FROM EVENT T1,EVENT_CATEGORY T2 WHERE T1.EVENT_SEQ = #EVENT_SEQ# AND T1.CATEGORY_SEQ = T2.CATEGORY_SEQ AND T1.DOMAIN_ID = CAST(#DOMAIN_ID# AS INTEGER)

/* eventUser.getEventTotCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM EVENT T1 ,EVENT_TARGET T2 ,EVENT_CATEGORY T3 WHERE T1.EVENT_SEQ = T2.EVENT_SEQ AND T1.CATEGORY_SEQ = T3.CATEGORY_SEQ AND T2.DEPT_CODE = #GROUP_ID# AND T1.STATE ='1' AND T1.DOMAIN_ID = #DOMAIN_ID# AND( (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') > TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') < TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ) AND ( TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+30, 'YYYYMMDD')) )

/* eventUser.getAttachFile */ SELECT T1.ATTACH_NO ,T1.ATTACH_SEQ ,T1.FILE_NM ,T1.FILE_SIZE ,T1.FILE_PATH ,T1.FILE_MASK ,T1.FILE_TYPE ,T1.REG_DATIM ,T1.REG_USER_ID FROM EVENT_FILE T1 WHERE ATTACH_NO = (SELECT ST1.ATTACH_NO FROM EVENT ST1 WHERE EVENT_SEQ = CAST(#EVENT_SEQ# AS INTEGER))

/* eventUser.getReply */
SELECT T1.EVENT_SEQ ,T1.REPLY_SEQ ,T1.EVENT_REPLY ,T1.STATE ,TRIM(T1.REG_USER_ID) AS REG_USER_ID ,T1.REG_DATIM ,T2.NM_KOR AS USER_KR_NM FROM EVENT_REPLY T1 ,USERPASS T2 WHERE TRIM(T1.REG_USER_ID) = TRIM(T2.USER_ID) AND T1.EVENT_SEQ = CAST(#EVENT_SEQ# AS INTEGER) ORDER BY T1.REPLY_SEQ DESC

/* eventUser.getApply */ SELECT T1.EVENT_SEQ ,T1.PEOPLE_SEQ ,T1.USER_ID ,T1.DEPT_CODE ,T1.NAME ,T1.APPLY_DATE ,T1.REG_DATIM ,T1.REG_USER_ID ,T1.UPD_USER_ID ,T1.UPD_DATIM ,T1.STATE
FROM EVENT_PEOPLE T1 WHERE STATE = 'Y' AND T1.EVENT_SEQ = CAST(#EVENT_SEQ# AS INTEGER) ORDER BY PEOPLE_SEQ DESC
sqlMap.insert: /* eventUser.insertReply */ INSERT INTO EVENT_REPLY ( EVENT_SEQ ,REPLY_SEQ ,EVENT_REPLY ,STATE ,REG_USER_ID ,REG_DATIM ,UPD_USER_ID ,UPD_DATIM )VALUES( #EVENT_SEQ# ,COALESCE((SELECT MAX(T1.REPLY_SEQ + 1) AS NEXT_SEQ FROM EVENT_REPLY T1 WHERE T1.EVENT_SEQ = #EVENT_SEQ#),1) ,#EVENT_REPLY# ,'Y' ,#REG_USER_ID# ,SYSDATE ,'' ,SYSDATE )
sqlMap.delete: /* eventUser.deleteReply */ DELETE FROM EVENT_REPLY WHERE EVENT_SEQ = CAST(#EVENT_SEQ# AS INTEGER) AND REPLY_SEQ = CAST(#REPLY_SEQ# AS INTEGER)
sqlMap.select:
/* eventUser.getCateCode */ SELECT T1.CATEGORY_SEQ
,T1.NM_KOR AS CATEGORY_NM
,T1.NM_ENG AS CATEGORY_NM
FROM EVENT_CATEGORY T1 WHERE T1.STATE ='Y' AND T1.DOMAIN_ID = CAST(#DOMAIN_ID# AS INTEGER) ORDER BY DSP_ORDER ASC
/* eventUser.getEventHour */ SELECT T1.CODE AS CODE ,T1.CODE_NAME AS CODE_NAME FROM CODEBASE T1 WHERE SYSTEM_CODE='PT' AND CODE_ID='994' AND CODE!='0000000000' ORDER BY CODE ASC
/* eventUser.getEventMinute */ SELECT T1.CODE AS CODE ,T1.CODE_NAME AS CODE_NAME FROM CODEBASE T1 WHERE SYSTEM_CODE='PT' AND CODE_ID='993' AND CODE!='0000000000' AND CODE_TAG1 = 'Y' ORDER BY CODE ASC
/* eventUser.getEventTarget */ SELECT T1.DEPT_CODE ,T1.USER_ID FROM EVENT_TARGET T1 WHERE T1.EVENT_SEQ = CAST(#EVENT_SEQ# AS INTEGER) ORDER BY TARGET_SEQ ASC

/* eventUser.getPlace */ SELECT T1.PLACE_NO ,T1.PLACE_SUB_NO ,T1.PLACE_BUILDING_KOR ,T1.PLACE_BUILDING_ENG ,T1.LATITUDE ,T1.LONGITUDE
FROM EVENT_PLACE T1 WHERE 1=1
AND PLACE_NO LIKE '%'||#SRCH_TEXT#||'%'
AND PLACE_BUILDING_KOR LIKE '%'||#SRCH_TEXT#||'%'
AND PLACE_BUILDING_ENG LIKE '%'||#SRCH_TEXT#||'%'

/* eventUser.getTargetGp */ SELECT T1.PRINCIPAL_ID ,T1.PRINCIPAL_NAME ,T1.PRINCIPAL_DESC ,T1.PRINCIPAL_ORDER FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL T1 WHERE T1.PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'G' AND T1.IS_ENABLED = 1
AND T1.SHORT_PATH LIKE '%'||'GRP_'||'%' ORDER BY PRINCIPAL_ORDER ASC
sqlMap.insert: /* eventUser.insertAttachFile */ INSERT INTO EVENT_FILE ( ATTACH_SEQ ,ATTACH_NO ,FILE_NM ,FILE_SIZE ,FILE_MASK ,FILE_PATH ,REG_DATIM ,REG_USER_ID )VALUES( ( SELECT NVL( MAX(ATTACH_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM EVENT_FILE) ,#ATTACH_NO# ,#FILE_NM# ,#FILE_SIZE# ,#FILE_MASK# ,#FILE_PATH# ,SYSDATE ,#REG_USER_ID# )
sqlMap.update:
/* eventUser.updateEvent */ UPDATE EVENT SET DOMAIN_ID = #DOMAIN_ID# ,CATEGORY_SEQ = #CATEGORY_SEQ# ,PRIORTY = #PRIORTY# ,TITLE_KOR = #TITLE_KOR# ,TITLE_ENG = #TITLE_ENG# ,CONTENTS_KOR = #CONTENTS_KOR# ,CONTENTS_ENG = #CONTENTS_ENG# ,TARGET_LINK = #TARGET_LINK# ,START_DATE = TO_DATE(#START_DATE#,'YYYYMMDD') ,START_TIME = #START_TIME# ,END_DATE = TO_DATE(#END_DATE#,'YYYYMMDD') ,END_TIME = #END_TIME# ,EVENT_START = TO_DATE(#EVENT_START_DATE#,'YYYYMMDD') ,EVENT_START_TIME = #EVENT_START_TIME# ,EVENT_END = TO_DATE(#EVENT_END_DATE#,'YYYYMMDD') ,EVENT_END_TIME = #EVENT_END_TIME#
,STATE = #STATE#
,EVENT_FEE_KOR = #EVENT_FEE_KOR# ,EVENT_FEE_ENG = #EVENT_FEE_ENG# ,OWNER_USER_ID = #OWNER_USER_ID# ,OWNER_PHONE = #OWNER_PHONE# ,OWNER_EMAIL = #OWNER_EMAIL# ,PLACE_NO = #PLACE_NO# ,PLACE_SUB_NO = #PLACE_SUB_NO# ,PLACE_NM = #PLACE_NM# ,PLACE_BUILDING_KOR = #PLACE_BUILDING_KOR# ,PLACE_BUILDING_ENG = #PLACE_BUILDING_ENG# ,PLACE_LATITUDE = #PLACE_LATITUDE# ,PLACE_LONGITUDE = #PLACE_LONGITUDE#
,IMAGE_PATH_KOR = #IMAGE_PATH_KOR# ,IMAGE_NM_KOR = #IMAGE_NM_KOR#
,IMAGE_PATH_ENG = #IMAGE_PATH_ENG# ,IMAGE_NM_ENG = #IMAGE_NM_ENG#
,UPD_DATIM = SYSDATE ,UPD_USER_ID = #UPD_USER_ID# WHERE EVENT_SEQ = #EVENT_SEQ#
sqlMap.delete: /* eventUser.deleteEventTarget */ DELETE FROM EVENT_TARGET WHERE EVENT_SEQ = #value#
/* eventUser.deleteAttachFile */ DELETE FROM EVENT_FILE WHERE ATTACH_NO = #value#
sqlMap.select:
/* eventUser.getMyEvList */ SELECT T1.EVENT_SEQ ,T1.DOMAIN_ID ,T1.CATEGORY_SEQ
,T1.TITLE_KOR AS TITLE ,T1.CONTENTS_KOR AS CONTENTS ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_ENG AS IMAGE_PATH_SUB ,T1.PLACE_BUILDING_KOR || T1.PLACE_NM AS PLACE_BUILDING ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_KOR AS IMAGE_PATH ,T1.IMAGE_NM_KOR AS IMAGE_NM ,T3.NM_KOR AS CATEGORY_NM
,T1.TITLE_ENG AS TITLE ,T1.CONTENTS_ENG AS CONTENTS ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_KOR AS IMAGE_PATH_SUB ,T1.PLACE_BUILDING_ENG || T1.PLACE_NM AS PLACE_BUILDING ,T1.IMAGE_PATH_ENG AS IMAGE_PATH ,T1.IMAGE_NM_ENG AS IMAGE_NM ,T3.NM_ENG AS CATEGORY_NM
,TO_CHAR(T1.START_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(T1.END_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS END_DATE ,SUBSTR(T1.START_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.START_TIME,3,4) AS START_TIME ,SUBSTR(T1.END_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(T1.END_TIME,3,4) AS END_TIME ,T1.TARGET_LINK ,T1.REG_DATIM FROM EVENT T1 ,( SELECT ST1.EVENT_SEQ ,ST1.PEOPLE_SEQ ,ST1.USER_ID ,ST1.APPLY_DATE ,ST1.STATE FROM EVENT_PEOPLE ST1 WHERE ST1.USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND STATE='Y' ORDER BY EVENT_SEQ ASC )T2 ,EVENT_CATEGORY T3 WHERE T1.EVENT_SEQ = T2.EVENT_SEQ AND T1.CATEGORY_SEQ = T3.CATEGORY_SEQ AND T1.STATE ='1' AND T1.DOMAIN_ID = CAST(#DOMAIN_ID# AS INTEGER) ORDER BY END_DATE DESC
